Macaron Care Instructions

Room Temperature

1-2 days

Refrigerator

3-5 days

Freezer

Up to 2 months

Pro Tip: Allow refrigerated macarons 15-20 minutes at room temperature before serving. Frozen macarons need 30-45 minutes to thaw.

Storage: Keep in airtight containers away from direct sunlight and moisture.
